title: Thumbelina
creator_credit: Primrose Productions, BBC-TV and Lotte Reiniger
brief_description: Hans Christian Anderson’s fairy tale retold in animated silhouettes. Lotte Reiniger developed this technique in Germany in the 1920’s and produced several silhouette films in the 1950’s for BBC Television. Designed and animated by Lotte Reiniger.
